Description.Name: Armor-Piercing AC/2 Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Armor-piercing rounds rely on improved anti-armor warheads to punch through armor and damage internal systems, at the expense of being heavier and reducing the weapon's accuracy. Armor-Piercing AC/2 Ammo Bins contain only 12 rounds and can only be used in standard and light autocannons.
